sentences.en: My little grandson is no trouble at all, but his 6-year-old sister is a handful.
sentences.cn: 我的小孙子一点不用人操心，但他6岁的姐姐却很难管教。

sentences.en: With a minimum of fuss, she produced the grandson he had so desperately wished for.
sentences.cn: 她不声不响地生出了他翘首以待的孙子。

sentences.en: Stan never cared about Zak, his grandson.
sentences.cn: 斯坦从不关心他的孙子扎克。
